articles.author: Ashley Strickland, CNN
articles.title: Artemis I rocket prepares for late August launch to the moon - CNN
articles.description: The mega Artemis I rocket may be launching on its trip to the moon by late August after a successful test this week. The rocket stack wil roll back into the Vehicle Assembly Building at Kennedy Space Center next week for final preparations.

articles.title: NASA Announces Launch Delay for Psyche Asteroid Mission - NASA
articles.description: NASA announced Friday that the Psyche asteroid mission – the agency’s first mission designed to study a metal-rich asteroid – will not make its planned 2022 launch attempt.
